567130.name: Boogeyman 2
567130.description:
[You do not need to have played the first game to play number 2. They both have their separate stories.]

Description

Awoken in the night by your doll. Speaking as if it possesses a mind of its own. The doll warns you of a monster that has come to take you away. Grab your flashlight and find the Boogeyman before he finds you!

Gameplay

• Watch.

• Listen.

• Batteries will only last so long. Conserve power, or risk trying to charge them up.

• Weather will change each night, affecting the way you play.

VR Support (Oculus Rift)

The game supports full VR running at 90fps using the Oculus rift CV1 with minimum specs (GTX 970).
567130.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
